item.title: Science Discovers a New Destiny for Your Old Mattress
item.description: Figuring out what to do with an unwanted mattress is the worst.

item.title: Guerrilla announces Horizon Zero Dawn spin-off Horizon Hunters Gathering, a 'tactical' 3-player co-op action game coming to PS5 and PC
item.description: Guerrilla Games has unveiled its new cooperative action game, Horizon Hunters Gathering, a spin-off tactical experience set in the world of Horizon Zero Dawn.

item.title: How to use your Apple Watch to precisely find your new AirTag
item.description: Our review of the new AirTag went up yesterday, and that involved testing the new Precision Finding feature on Apple Watches. In the process, I found the setup to be confusing and counterintuitive, and was relieved to discover it wasn’t just me. If, like me, you’ve been trying to set up Precision Finding on your Apple Watch for the AirTag you’ve just unboxed and attached to a precious belonging, here are the exact steps to take. First, make sure your Apple Watch is compatible with the feature. That means verifying you’re using the Series 9 or later (you would have bought it in or after 2023) o...

item.title: Quel Chromebook choisir en 2026 ? Les meilleurs PC portables sous ChromeOS
item.description: Les Chromebooks peuvent être des alternatives intéressantes aux PC portables sous Windows, si vous cherchez un ordinateur vraiment abordable. Nous avons sélectionné pour vous les meilleurs Chromebooks du marché.

item.title: Accrochez-vous à votre GeForce : Nvidia ne sortira pas de nouvelle carte graphique de si tôt
item.description: Pour la première fois en 30 ans, Nvidia ne commercialisera pas un nouveau modèle de carte graphique cette année. La prochaine génération GeForce RTX 60 est également retardée.

item.title: Valheim is coming to Switch 2 this year
item.description: After celebrating its fifth anniversary earlier this month, the tough-as-nails survival Viking game Valheim is coming to Switch 2 this year. Initially launched as a Steam Early Access game in 2021, Valheim lets you team up with up to nine other players online as you explore a procedurally generated open world inspired by Norse mythology. Whether playing alone or with your Viking pals, survival depends on crafting the right gear, building shelters and prevailing in punishing combat encounters. The ultimate aim of the game is to kill various gods dotted around the game's different biomes to be d...

item.title: Nvidia’s RTX 50-series Super refresh is delayed, and the RTX 60-series might miss 2027
item.description: The Super refresh to Nvidia's RTX 50-series GPUs was expected at CES 2026 in January, but it didn't make an appearance. The Information reports that in December, Nvidia managers decided not to release the new cards as scheduled, choosing to prioritize AI chips instead due to the limited supply of RAM currently available. On top […]

item.title: I test TVs for a living, and these 3 models are the perfect budget-friendly options that I recommend for the Super Bowl
item.description: Looking for a bigger TV for the Super Bowl? These 3 TVs should be top of your shopping list.

item.title: PlayStation’s live service push continues with a co-op Horizon spinoff
item.description: Sony is expanding its Horizon universe again with Horizon Hunters Gathering, a "cooperative action game" in development by franchise creator Guerrilla for PS5 and PC. Horizon Hunters Gathering lets "up to three players team up as heroic Hunters to protect a world under threat from deadly machines," according to a blog post. "Combat is tactical, […]

item.title: Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth comes to Switch 2 on June 3
item.description: Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth is heading to the Switch 2 on June 3. The news was dropped at this morning's Nintendo Direct livestream. This is the second part of the FF7 remake-a-palooza. The first installment, Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade, was released for Nintendo's console on January 22. Only a six month wait between chapters? Sony fans had to wait four years. For the uninitiated, Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth remakes the middle portion of the PS1 classic Final Fantasy 7. The graphics are, obviously, quite different, but so is the gameplay. This isn't exactly the JRPG you remember, with a real tim...

item.title: Game consoles built streaming — until it outgrew them

It's been a rough couple of days for gamers who also love to binge their favorite TV shows with their consoles: At the beginning of the week, Netflix began informing […]

item.title: Peloton’s gamble on expensive new hardware has yet to pay off
item.description: Last fall, new Peloton CEO Peter Stern made a bet. The company announced a complete refresh of its entire hardware lineup, complete with swivel screens and AI-powered features. Today, the initial results of Stern's bet are in. In its Q2 2026 earnings call, Stern noted that the hardware refresh hasn't landed with existing Peloton users, […]

item.title: Les JBL Tune Flex Edition perdent plus de 50 % de leur prix chez Amazon
item.description: Même s'ils vont bientôt fêter leurs quatre ans, les JBL Tune Flex Ghost Edition possèdent encore des qualités qui valent le coup aujourd'hui, à commencer par la réduction de bruit active ou encore la certification IPX4 contre l'eau et la transpiration. Chez Amazon, ils tombent à 46,99 euros au lieu de 99,99 euros.

item.title: Guerrilla reveals Horizon Hunters Gathering, a co-op action spin-off for PS5 and PC
item.description: Horizon is one of PlayStation's biggest franchises at this point. Alongside Horizon Zero Dawn and Horizon Forbidden West, there are a bunch of spin-off games. Joining them is Horizon Hunters Gathering, a co-op action game that original Horizon developer Guerrilla is making for PlayStation 5 and PC. We've known since 2022 that the studio was working on a Horizon multiplayer game.Here, you'll be able to team up with a couple of friends to hunt killer machines, Monster Hunter style. Guerrilla says it's designing the hunts to be challenging and replayable. "Combat is tactical, reactive, and deeply...

item.description: Substack a mis plusieurs mois à se rendre compte qu’un pirate avait mis la main sur les données de certains de ses utilisateurs. Adresses e‑mail, numéros de téléphone et métadonnées ont été compromises.

item.title: Voici les 3 marques de batteries les plus répandues dans les voitures électriques dans le monde en 2025
item.description: Le secteur des batteries pour les voitures électriques confirme sa croissance à deux chiffres avec une progression de 31,7 % en 2025. Mais derrière ces chiffres encourageants se cache une concentration du marché, dominé par deux géants chinois qui trustent désormais plus de la moitié des parts mondiales.

item.title: Amazon va utiliser l’IA pour réduire les coûts de ses films et séries
item.description: À force de licencier des humains, il n'y aura bientôt plus personne pour produire des films et des séries télé chez Amazon ! Qu'à cela ne tienne, l'IA générative arrive à la rescousse pour remplir le catalogue de Prime Video à peu de frais. Bien sûr, c'est caricatural, mais le géant du commerce en ligne mise beaucoup sur cette technologie pour réduire les coûts de production....

item.title: Groupe de l’ONU sur l’IA | Yoshua Bengio parmi les experts pressentis
item.description: Le chercheur montréalais Yoshua Bengio et la journaliste philippine et prix Nobel de la paix Maria Ressa figurent parmi les 40 experts proposés pour intégrer le groupe de l’ONU sur l’IA.

item.title: Community is the smartest investment a solopreneur can make
item.description: Community isn’t a ‘nice to have’ for the self-employed. It’s strategic infrastructure. We’ve been sold a myth about entrepreneurial success: sharpen your skills, tighten your systems, hustle harder. But after years of working with independent professionals across industries, I’ve noticed that the highest performers share something that rarely makes the productivity lists: they’ve intentionally built communities of colleagues, clients, and partners who expand how they think, create, and deliver impact....

item.title: Trump’s critical mineral reserve is an admission that the future is electric
item.description: The administration's $12 billion stockpile of critical minerals is aimed at blunting China's influence. But it also revels the direction of the global economy.

item.title: Jusqu’à 8 mois d’attente : pourquoi certaines voitures électriques de Peugeot et Citroën ont autant de retard en ce moment
item.description: Les ambitions électriques de Stellantis se heurtent à la dure réalité industrielle. La production chaotique des batteries d'Automotive Cells Company (ACC) repousse de plusieurs mois la livraison de voitures électriques comme les Peugeot e-3008 et e-5008. Un premier revers pour l'usine française qui peine à trouver son rythme.

item.title: Presidents' Day sales 2026: The best tech deals from Apple, Sony, Roku and others
item.description: Presidents’ Day is a great time to buy appliances, mattresses and furniture as they are often on sale for the holiday. Tech also gets discounted around this time, but you have to do a bit more digging to find actually good deals. And this year, Presidents’ Day comes right after Valentine’s Day and Super Bowl 2026, which means there are some overlapping sales to consider. If you don’t want to sort through the mess of bad deals out there, Engadget has you covered. We’re curating the best President Day sales on tech we can find right here. We’ll update this post through the holiday as more deals ...

item.title: Why is the Trump administration really appealing its Meta loss?

Another part of the statement was anything but: a political attack on the judge himself. "The deck was always stacked against us with […]

item.title: What the latest Epstein files release says about crisis PR
item.description: The challenge grows stronger the less truthful someone is, an expert says. Another round of Epstein files—approximately three million documents—was released January 30, and this batch included a lot of prominent names. That list included philanthropist and business magnate Bill Gates, entrepreneur Elon Musk, and author, doctor and longevity influencer Peter Attia. They were all allegedly connected to Epstein in different ways, and as a result, their mentions in the documents are varied. But it’s their responses that offer lessons to others in the business world about how to respond when faced ...

item.title: Mel Robbins: Being stuck doesn’t mean you’re broken. It means you’re ready to change
item.description: The podcast host, author, and inspirational speaker argues that being at rock bottom can lead to transformational shifts. Known as the self-help guru whose tagline “let them” has encouraged millions to stop worrying what others are doing or saying, and focus on their own personal growth, has another significant lesson: don’t be afraid to keep moving forward to goals. ...

item.title: Data breach at govtech giant Conduent balloons, affecting millions more Americans
item.description: The ransomware attack at Conduent allowed hackers to steal a "significant number of individuals’ personal information" from the govtech giant's systems. Conduent handles personal and health data of more than 100 million people across America.

item.title: Winter Olympics 2026: Gold and silver medals skyrocket in value this year. Here’s how much they’re worth

item.title: Voitures électriques : Nio rejoint Tesla dans un cercle très fermé, celui de la rentabilité
item.description: Onze ans après sa création, la marque chinoise Nio vient d'annoncer ses premiers profits sur le quatrième trimestre 2025. Une étape cruciale, mais qui reste à consolider dans un marché en pleine mutation.

item.title: Substack CEO informs users of a data breach
item.description: The digital publishing platform Substack has told some of its users that their data was stolen in a security breach. The affected account holders had their email addresses and phone numbers scraped in a hack that occurred in October 2025. In an email posted on Bluesky, Substack CEO, Christ Best, said the company became aware of the breach on February 3, which involved an "unauthorized third party to access limited user data without permission." While internal metadata was also shared in the hack, Best said that credit card numbers and other financial details were not. No passwords were obtaine...

item.description: OpenSSL 3.x creates a critical scalability and security dilemma for the industry, forcing organizations to evaluate alternative SSL libraries.

item.title: Fallout 4 and Indiana Jones and the Great Circle get Switch 2 release dates
item.description: Todd Howard made a surprise appearance at the end of Thursday’s Nintendo Direct Partner Showcase to share updates about a few Bethesda Game Studios that are coming to Nintendo Switch 2 this year. The first of those is Fallout 4: Anniversary Edition, which will hit the console on February 24.This version of Fallout 4 debuted on PC, Xbox and PlayStation in November. It includes the base game and all DLC, as well as Creation Club mods. It’ll land on Switch 2 just a few weeks after the second season of the Fallout TV show wrapped up. A Switch 2 version was previously announced, but we didn’t have ...

item.title: Are LTMs the next LLMs? This new type of AI can do what large-language models can’t
item.description: Fundamental, which just closed a $225 million funding round, develops ‘large tabular models’ for structured data like tables and spreadsheets. Large-language models (LLMs) have taken the world by storm, but they’re only one type of underlying AI model. An under-the-radar company, Fundamental, is set to bring a new type of enterprise AI model to the masses: large tabular models, or LTMs—which could have an even bigger impact for businesses....

item.title: Why some jobs trigger old fears
item.description: The past shows up at work not as a memory, but as a reflex. Work has a way of waking up parts of us we thought we’d outgrown.
